name: Funky Punky
overview: Ahrrrrg !, what a headache! I won't throw another party until two months have passed. Taking! if I have an evaluation exam today at 10; and still here ... FUNKY PUNKY really has it hard. You must go to the institute to take the exam that has at 10 in the morning. It's 8 o'clock and he still has to pick up all his messy things among the waste from the party that took place in his apartment the night before. When he gathers them, he has to take his moped and go to the institute crossing the dangerous streets out of town, full of half-asleep drivers heading to work. Once there, You will have to find the classroom where the exam will be done and face with resignation the ten questions that will decide your aptitude to pass the course. To take the exam it will be You need to bring your pen and scientific calculator. Of course, he has not had breakfast and to keep his energies at a high level he must eat the DONUTS and drink the bottles you find. A cigarette after the meal will not will feel bad. The effects of the hangover will make you see strange bugs that you will have to avoid if you want to continue his wanderings. To see the time remaining until the exam time, you must collect the clock. And to be able to open the lock of the motorcycle you will have to use your key. Hurry !, there is little time left and the road to the institute is long.
